column4: If it really bothers you to see it as a option on boot-up, you can always remove it from your Grub boot screen.
Nah. I was really curious as to why I had it. Like durka said, I might as well leave it for now
Can you use ALSA or do you need the special functionality of pulseaudio?
I should be able to use ALSA for everything. I may have called this down on myself from trying to get Flash sound working right
